alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Kingman; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, Reno, northwestern Harvey, northwestern Kingman, northwestern Marion and southeastern Saline Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 957 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Assaria to 5 miles south of Windom to Zenith. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Hesston, South Hutchinson, Moundridge, Inman, Buhler, Haven, Burrton, Galva, Canton, Pretty Prairie, Goessel, Arlington, Cunningham, Gypsum, Turon, Partridge, Sylvia, and Lehigh. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 40 and 76. Interstate 70 near Mile Marker 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Harvey; Kingman; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Saline
